properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 14 at 8:36PM EST until February 17 at 4:45PM EST by NWS Columbia SC
properties.description:
...The River Flood Warning Continue for the Following Rivers
in South Carolina...

Great Pee Dee River at Cheraw affecting Chesterfield and
Marlboro Counties

Congaree River at Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun...Lexington
and Richland Counties

Congaree River at Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun
and Richland Counties

Wateree River at Lake Wateree affecting Fairfield...Kershaw and
Lancaster Counties

.Moderate to high levels will continue on many area rivers because
of recent heavy rain and additional releases from upstream reservoirs.

The Flood Warning extended for the Great Pee Dee River at Cheraw.
* Through Monday...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 8 PM Friday the stage was 29.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 30.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river at Cheraw will crest around 31.5 feet
Saturday night.
* At 30 feet...The higher bank begins to flood. Large areas of
farmland and river bottomland near Cheraw will be flooded.
Portions of Riverside Park become flooded.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The
water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to
play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to noaa weather radio...
local media or the internet for further statements and updated
forecasts.
